name: Glassy
subheading: Glassy is a e-comarce website, where sunglasses are sold
overview: This is a sunglass selling full-stact website
Users can browse all sunglass collections and details
Users can order sunglass & manage their orders and give feedback
Admin can approve clients orders or can cancel clients orders
An Admin can give access of manages orders to other users and deprive access also

name: TourX
subheading: From TourX tourists can buy various tourism packages
overview: Users can see all tour packages and details
Users can book tour packages, manage bookings

name: Mediplus
subheading: Patients receive medical services from MediPlus
overview: This is a front-end design of a medical clinic website
Users can see all services of the hospital
Logged In users can see details of services
